column4: Hi, i want to automatically login a 'user', but in "Security Tab -> Security -> Allow root to login with GDM (Checked)" the user isn't visible.  Any ideas?
bad idea to log in as root
don't want to login as root
that option doesn't help your cause
doh!  misquote; "Security Tab -> Enable Automatic Login (Checked)
some have, yes, there's a howto on ubuntuforums.org about that
I'll dig up a link for you
good to know, but have no idea what I told you! :)

well seems so.  I'm try to get it working on somebody else's computer by remote logging in.  They went to bed and turned out all the lights,  Therefore all i see is black, but different shades.  so i guess it's working!  ;)
